name: Outlook Power Layout
description: Usability tweaks for Outlook.com which is Microsoft's overhauled Hotmail email service. It's nicely laid out and modern but there were a few things that got in the way of real usability. Here are the tweaks that I use with Outlook.com or Live.com.
additional_info:
Alpha Version 2012-12-29
  • Make main content cover the far right panel so you can see the whole email
  • Hide the copyright bar at the bottom and extend the main content
More to come!!
